item.description:
Report X-2024051747

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-03T15:13:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-21
  • City: BOZRAH
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: OUTER PACKAGE WAS TORN AND SET ASIDE FOR INSPECTION REWRAP. INSPECTION FOUND THAT PACKAGE CONTAINED 9 RECHARGABLE VAPES, LITHIUM ION BATTERIES CONTAINED IN EQUIPMENT. REWRAP; NO DAMAGE.
